data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for San Jose in San Jose.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick Portland.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of Portland.
In the minute 8, San Jose drive upfield and Marcos Lopez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Portland defender.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
San Jose are coming forward and Paul Marie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Portland's area.
Goal kick for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 12, Vako Qazaishvili (San Jose) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Portland push forward at Earthquakes Stadium and Pablo Bonilla gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined San Jose defence.
In the minute 14, Portland have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 16, San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets in a shot on goal at Earthquakes Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vako Qazaishvili of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
In the minute 19, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Portland.
Throw-in Portland.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Portland.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 25, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alex Chilowicz awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
San Jose will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portland.
San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Can San Jose capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
San Jose pushes forward through Oswaldo Alanis, whose finish on goal is saved.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, San Jose's Florian Jungwirth has been booked in San Jose.
In San Jose San Jose attack through Judson. The finish is off target, however.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Yimmi Chara is on target to give Portland a 0-1 advantage.
Great play from Diego Chara to set up the goal.
Alex Chilowicz signals a San Jose throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Portland are pushing forward but Yimmi Chara's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 38, San Jose's Vako Qazaishvili fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Vako Qazaishvili for San Jose gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 39, Alex Chilowicz waits before resuming play because Pablo Bonilla for Portland is still down.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Pablo Bonilla returns to the field for Portland after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 42, Portland have a goal kick.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Portland to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 45, San Jose's Vako Qazaishvili is on target but unsuccessful.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Oswaldo Alanis is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Alex Chilowicz has blown to start the second-half.
Oswaldo Alanis is back on his feet again.
In the minute 46, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tommy Thompson is on a sub for Oswaldo Alanis for San Jose.
San Jose make their first substitution with Shea Salinas replacing Paul Marie.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 50, Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.

Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?

It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.

In the minute 55, Felipe Mora gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
Alex Chilowicz awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bill Tuiloma.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
In the minute 61, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Portland's Bill Tuiloma is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 63, San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
San Jose's Jackson Yueill breaks free at Earthquakes Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 64, The away team have replaced Felipe Mora with Jeremy Ebobisse. This is the first substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's second substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Marvin Loria replacing Yimmi Chara.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Cristhian Paredes replacing Eryk Williamson.

The home team replace Cristian Espinoza with Cade Cowell.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 71, Portland have a goal kick.

Portland's Marvin Loria misses with an attempt on goal.

Portland needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.

Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Vako Qazaishvili.
Chris Wondolowski with an assist there.
In the minute 78, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Portland throw-in in San Jose's half.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 80, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portland close to the penalty box.
Portland drives forward and Jaroslaw Niezgoda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Tomas Conechny is replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda for the away team.
Alex Chilowicz blows against San Jose's Cade Cowell for offside.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 84, Free kick San Jose.
Dario Zuparic (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Cristhian Paredes (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Free kick in a good position for San Jose!
Vako Qazaishvili (San Jose) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, San Jose push upfield and Chris Wondolowski gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Portland defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Portland.

The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
